Notes: Limited run of Hair in good ol' rainy New Jersey. came for Jordan Dobson, stayed for Andrew Polec. there was not a single bad performance in this cast, but the standouts (for me) are Andrew and Janelle McDermoth. HUGE apologies for the guy next to me who you can very clearly hear singing during way too many numbers - Aquarius, I Got Life and Hair, especially. I'm still mad about this. bows video included.
